title: [Medicine] A real-world retrospective cohort study involving nearly 1.2 million people shows COVID-19 infections in the ‘fully’ vaccinated are rare but are more common and severe in people with weaker immune systems

[Epidemiology] Participation in a large, indoor, live gathering without physical distancing was not associated with increased SARS-CoV-2–transmission risk, provided a comprehensive preventive intervention was implemented: a non-inferiority, randomised, controlled trail at the Accor Arena on May 29, 2021 in Paris
